Comment: Polygraphs are complete BS. They don‚Äôt detect lies or truth. They don‚Äôt do anything at all. You can‚Äôt pass or fail one. It‚Äôs just a game the police play to they to get people to say something.  ‚ÄúDid you kill the victim?‚Äù ‚ÄúNo.‚Äù ‚ÄúThis polygraph says you are lying.‚Äù ‚ÄúOk I did it but it was self defense.‚Äù  That‚Äôs how it works. That‚Äôs why results are not admissible in court. You can‚Äôt be forced to to take one, you can refuse to take one without any penalty, and if you take one the ‚Äúresult‚Äù can‚Äôt be used against you.
